name: Impsie Daisy
description:
☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆ ☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆  ☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆

No tail? No problem!

Story

Impsie and Wanda are good friends who love to hang out together. They also happen to like pranking each other. After Impsie's successful plan to steal Wanda's glasses (and hiding them in plain sight), Wanda gets back at Impsie by taking her tail! To get it back, Impsie must navigate through three Block House mazes laid out by Wanda. Can she find her way to victory? Or will this tale never end?

Controls

WASD / Arrow keys (on mobile) - Directional movement

 J / Z / ( A on mobile) - Activate switches / open hidden doors / speed up text

Music Credits

  Peppy Regal Overworld, Victory Lap & Little Tune 11
